<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|string|LootTable}}: Optional. Name of the loot table to use. If this is used in a chest-like container, the loot table generates its content when it is opened. Generating the items in the container removes both loot table tags ({{nbt|string|LootTable}} and {{nbt|long|LootTableSeed}}). Is not preserved when removed.<!--What does the note about loading items from NBT mean?-->
** {{nbt|long|LootTableSeed}}: Optional. Seed for generating the loot table. The default value works similarly to the seeds for worlds, where value of {{cd|0}} or an omitted value causes the game to use a random seed.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
